title: üéâ Welcome to CityWitty Merchant Hub!
message: Thank you for joining our platform! We're excited to help you grow your business. Complete your profile to start connecting with customers and showcase your products and services.

title: ‚úÖ Profile Approved!
message: Congratulations! Your merchant profile has been reviewed and approved by our team. Your business is now live and visible to customers on CityWitty!

title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Complete Your Profile
message: Your merchant profile is incomplete. Please add missing information including business description, contact details, and store images to improve your visibility and attract more customers.

title: üí∞ Payment Received
message: Your payment of ‚Çπ5,000 has been successfully processed. The amount will be credited to your registered bank account within 2-3 business days. Thank you for your business!

title: üöÄ New Feature: Analytics Dashboard
message: We've just launched our new analytics dashboard! Track your business performance with detailed insights including views, engagement, customer demographics, and sales trends. Check it out now!

title: üîß Scheduled Maintenance
message: Our systems will undergo scheduled maintenance on December 25, 2024, from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM IST. Some features may be temporarily unavailable during this time. We apologize for any inconvenience.

title: üì∏ Add Store Images
message: Merchants with store images receive 3x more customer views! Upload high-quality photos of your store, products, and team to build trust and attract more customers.

title: ‚≠ê New Customer Review
message: You've received a new 5-star review from a customer! Positive reviews help improve your business visibility and attract more customers. Keep up the great work!

title: üéÅ Create Your First Offer
message: Attract more customers by creating special offers and promotions! Businesses with active offers see a 40% increase in customer inquiries. Start creating offers today!

title: üî¥ Urgent: Verify Your Email
message: Your email address is not verified. Please verify your email within 48 hours to continue using all features. Click here to resend verification email.

title: üì¶ New Purchase Request
message: You have received a new purchase request from a customer. Review and approve the request to complete the sale. Responding quickly improves customer satisfaction!

title: üéì Merchant Training Webinar
message: Join our free webinar on December 20, 2024, at 5:00 PM IST to learn advanced tips for growing your business on CityWitty. Register now - limited seats available!

title: üíº Business Hours Not Set
message: You haven't set your business hours yet. Let customers know when you're open! This helps them plan their visits and improves their experience.

title: üèÜ Achievement Unlocked: 100 Profile Views!
message: Congratulations! Your business profile has reached 100 views. Keep engaging with customers and updating your offers to maintain momentum!

title: üì± Connect Your Social Media
message: Connect your social media accounts to your CityWitty profile. This helps customers find you on their preferred platforms and builds trust in your business.
